subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Awards, Decorations and Honors
organizations: National Museum of Racings Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: The trainer Jerry Hollendorfer and the champion fillies Open Mind, Safely Kept and Sky Beauty were elected to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame in Saratoga Spring, N.Y.
snippet: The trainer Jerry Hollendorfer and the champion fillies Open Mind, Safely Kept and Sky Beauty were elected to the National Museum of Racing’s Hall of Fame in Saratoga Spring, N.Y.
